net.bytebuddy.implementation

接口 ExceptionMethod.ConstructionDelegate

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ExceptionMethod.ConstructionDelegate.ForDefaultConstructor, ExceptionMethod.ConstructionDelegate.ForStringConstructor
    封闭类:
    ExceptionMethod

    public static interface ExceptionMethod.ConstructionDelegate
    A construction delegate is responsible for calling a Throwable's constructor.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  ExceptionMethod.ConstructionDelegate.ForDefaultConstructor
      A construction delegate that calls the default constructor.
      static class  ExceptionMethod.ConstructionDelegate.ForStringConstructor
      A construction delegate that calls a constructor that takes a single string as its argument.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      StackManipulation make()
      Creates a stack manipulation that creates pushes all constructor arguments onto the operand stack and subsequently calls the constructor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • make

        StackManipulation make()
        Creates a stack manipulation that creates pushes all constructor arguments onto the operand stack and subsequently calls the constructor.
        返回:
        A stack manipulation for constructing a isThrowable.
